title: Which type of JavaScript language is ___
Which one of the following also known as Conditional Expression:
In JavaScript, what is a block of statement?
answer_2: block that combines a number of statements into a single compound statement
answer_3: both conditional block and a single statement
answer_4: block that contains a single statement

title: When interpreter encounters an empty statements, what it will do:
Which of the following variables takes precedence over the others if the names are the same?

In the JavaScript, which one of the following is not considered as an error:
Which one of the following method or operator is used for identification of the array?
For which purpose the array 'map()' methods is used ?
answer_1: It used for mapping the elements of another array into itself.
answer_2: It passes each data-item of the array and returns the necessary mapped elements.
answer_3: It passes the data-items of an array into another array.
answer_4: It passes every element of the array on which it is invoked to the function you specify, and returns an array containing the values returned by that function.
right_answer: It passes every element of the array on which it is invoked to the function you specify, and returns an array containing the values returned by that function.

title: Both the 'rduucedRight()' and 'reduce()' methods follow which one of the following common operation?
Which one of the following given task is performed by the 'pop()' method of the array?
answer_1: Itupdates the element of the array
answer_2: it increments the total length of the array by 1
answer_3: It prints the first element and made no impact on the length of the array
answer_4: updates the element removes one element of an array on each time the 'pop()' function called
right_answer: updates the element removes one element of an array on each time the 'pop()' function called

title: What will happen if we use the 'join()' method along with the 'reverse()' method?
answer_1: It will reverse and concatenates the elements of the array
answer_2: It will reverse the element and store the elements in the same array
answer_3: It will just reverse the element of the array
answer_4: It will store the elements of the specified array in the normal order
right_answer: It will reverse the element and store the elements in the same array
